repnme.cdata!:
Rwanda - Technical Assistance For the
            Improvement of Public Finance Management Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Government's main objective is
            to improve, through the Technical Assistance to the Ministry
            of Finance and Economy Project, its control over public
            finance.  To that end, the project will aim at:  (a)
            training; (i) staff in MINIFINECO; and (ii) financial
            managers in technical ministries, parastatals, and
            development projects.  It will; (b) improve procedures for
            budget preparation and execution (including financial
            management of the parastatal sector); and (c) strengthen
            Government capabilities for economic policy making.
            Proposed project components will include; (a) training for
            MINIFINECO staff and for financial managers in other
            ministries as well as selected parastatal agencies through;
            (i) establishment of a Training Center in MINIFINECO; and
            (ii) remedial training for current staff.  The project will
            further involve; (b) improvement of tax, customs, budgetary
            and accounting procedures through; (i) technical assistance;
            and (ii) phased introduction of automated data processing.
            Finally, the venture will improve; (c) financial management
            of the parastatal sector portfolio as well as; (d) economic
            policy-making and provide; (e) vehicles and equipment.
